Name: Seraph's Last Stand
About the game: Seraph's Last Stand is a rogue-like shoot 'em up based on the flash era classic 'Heli Attack', where every wave you pick a new upgrade and try to break the game with crazy builds. You start clean every playthrough, but if you choose the right combinations, you can snowballs into powerful builds: Some features of the game are: - 40+ different items to compose your builds and secret items you discover by stacking. - Multiple staves and hats to chose from. - A leaderboard system, with world, national and local ranks. You can contact me at: oddgiantstudio@gmail.com
